summary:
20+ years of professional experience in Finance & Accounting processes, Business Process Management:

-Performance Management
-Transformation/Improvement & Stabilization
-Personal Development& Reward scheme
-Strategic & Operating planning and control
-Financial and Managerial Accounting and Reporting
-Business process automation

school.name: Business School of Belarusian State University, Minsk

profile_positions.description:
- Define and retrieve alignment on global Finance business requirements and applicable business processes
- Design, construct, test and implement the global ERP JD Edwards template on time and budget for the applicable international Heineken Operating Companies.
- Drive, guide, plan and motivate the Finance works stream team consisting of Heineken business analysts and external vendor solution consultants
- Coach and mentor Business Analysts who may or may not be direct reports; provide feedback for performance reviews and development plans 
- Ensure proper, consistent and clear communications & reporting to and alignment with Project stakeholders like (delegate) Functional Owners, other project Workstream leads, external suppliers and the Program board. 
- Assist in resolution of the critical issues that may derail a project, provide solutions
- Participate in post project reviews and document lessons learned
profile_positions.title: Work Stream Lead Finance

profile_positions.description:
- Define and implement the organisation structure and implementation of parallel accounting according to Heineken Standards for Local and Corporate chart of account (2 books in one concept)
- Motivation scheme development for project team members
- Development and implementation of Purchase order in 1С
- Design and implement process improvements;
- Alignment with appropriate Stakeholders in Finance business stream
- Effectively communicate project expectations to project members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion
profile_positions.title: Change Manager

profile_positions.description:
Team of 8 Finance specialists 
- Drive, guide, plan and execute Local and IFRS Accounting (management and control) in Ln and Hyperion
- Prepare (consolidated) financial statements and annual reports as well as financial reports
- Prepare and consolidated Managerial reporting for internal stakeholders
- Drive and monitor Strategic & Operating Planning (annual, quarterly process) 
- Drive Cash Flow management, Cash forecasting
- Provide detailed analysis of bid data each quarter, considering FX fluctuation, product transition, and application of specific regional strategy
- Conduct quarterly account reviews to optimize pricing/configurations, with the objective of maximizing revenue, margin and customer experience whilst ensuring compliance to contractual commitments 
- Consulting of business (conduct business partnering)
- Supervise the set-up and maintenance of computerized administrations and/or financial databases.
- Generate and administer accounting procedures and ensure that all procedures are carried out in accordance with relevant legislation and policies.
- Prepare audit trails and support the audit process.
- Prepare VAT and CIT returns and handle tax-assessments.
- Maintain contact with investment managers, trustees, collateral administrators, banks and other involved parties in order to obtain the required information for reporting purposes, for meeting deadlines and for serving the client's needs.

Achievements: 
-	Development and implementation of Standard costing management in 1C (local ERP solution)
-	Automation of interface between different database (XA- 1C – Ln) in order to avoid duplicate work and human errors
-	Driving the project Corporate Credit Policy improving Cash Collection and Account Receivables
-	Reduce the period-end closing duration from 10 to 3 days
profile_positions.title: Finance Manager

profile_positions.description:
Team of 25 Finance specialists 
- Local and IFRS Accounting (management and control) in SAP
- Prepare (consolidated) financial statements and annual reports as well as financial reports
- Prepare and consolidated Managerial reporting for internal stakeholders
- Drive and monitor Strategic & Operating Planning (annual, quarterly process) 
- Drive Cash Flow management, Cash forecasting
- Provide detailed analysis of bid data each quarter, considering FX fluctuation, product transition, and application of specific regional strategy
- Conduct quarterly account reviews to optimize pricing/configurations, with the objective of maximizing revenue, margin and customer experience whilst ensuring compliance to contractual commitments 
- Driving the SAP local implementation project
- Coach and mentor team members; provide feedback for performance reviews and development plans
- Creating, driving, updating local policies and procedures aligned with corporate guidelines
- Consulting of business (conduct business partnering)

Achievements: 
-	Built of strong Finance team (organisational restructuring)
-	Reduce completion of period-end closing procedure from 5 to 3 days
profile_positions.title: Finance Accounting Manager

profile_positions.description:
Team of 60 Finance specialists.
- Drive, guide and monitor the different financial areas (Property Accounting and Rental)
- Completing Tax obligations according to local legislation
- Drive Tax management and Statistical reporting
- Creating, driving, updating local policies and procedures aligned with corporate guidelines
- Local implementation of the Corporate Regulations & Guidelines
- People management including creating and motivating appraisals of Finance specialists.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Chief Accountant

profile_positions.description:
- Drive, guide and monitor all financial areas
- Prepare (consolidated) financial statements and annual reports as well as financial reports
- Prepare and consolidated Managerial reporting for internal stakeholders	
- Conduct quarterly account reviews to optimize pricing/configurations, taxation, with the objective of maximizing revenue, margin and customer experience whilst ensuring compliance to contractual commitments
- Prepare, approve and submit the quarterly balance to the bank (to verify the customer creditworthiness)
- Analysis of Financial Statements for customer’s creditworthiness evaluation before concluding leasing agreements (Credit Check)
- Analysis of Financial Statement of MazContractLeasing
- Maintain and develop relationships with domestic and foreign advisors and banks
- Design, construct, test and implement the local ERP 1C on time (during 1,5 months) and budget
profile_positions.title: Chief Accountant

- Drive, guide and monitor all financial areas

- Prepare and consolidated Managerial reporting for internal stakeholders	
- Conduct quarterly account reviews to optimize pricing/configurations, taxation, with the objective of maximizing revenue, margin and customer experience whilst ensuring compliance to contractual commitments
- Prepare, approve and submit the quarterly balance to the bank (to verify the Izobudpromstroy creditworthiness)
- Drive Cash flow management
profile_positions.title: Chief Accountant

profile_positions.description:
- Drive, guide and monitor all financial areas
- Prepare (consolidated) financial statements and annual reports as well as financial reports
- Prepare and consolidated Managerial reporting for internal stakeholders
- Conduct quarterly account reviews to optimize pricing/configurations, taxation, with the objective of maximizing revenue, margin
- Drive Cash flow management

profile_positions.title: Chief Accountant

profile_positions.description:
- Drive Payroll accounting, 
- Prepare tax and statistical reporting related to personal cost
- Lead for Automate Payroll Accounting and Personnel (1C)
- Consulting of business
- Development of technical specifications and implementation of process improvements in 1C
profile_positions.title: Financial Accountant
